name: PixelMagic
changelog:
• Initial QPR3
  • Fixed crash when jack 3.5 was inserted
  • Tuned haptics
  • fixed MagicEraser
  • added "per-app" volume control
  • added Cloning apps feature
  • added feature to set different ringtones for both sim card's
  • Fixed issue when flashing rdp builds didn't work after qpr1 a14
notes:
• Magicxavi is currently maintaining YAAP HOMEMADE and PixelMagic ALPHAGENE r10. You should switch and/or use that ROM instead.
  • You need to be on RDP rom to flash this rom, if your previous rom have normal partitions layout, you need to flash RDP rom first, and then flash this build. Use latest boot.img from notes.
  • Thanks to all my contributors :)
  • Bugs: Portrait and night mode in miui camera not working, Maybe more
